DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Eating diet rich soy food appear reduce risk type cancer . Isoflavones compound find soy food may prevent development cancer . PURPOSE : Clinical trial determine effective amount type soy isoflavones need diet healthy men woman prevent cancer .
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : I . Determine effect vary dietary intake soy nut plasma level urinary excretion isoflavones . II . Determine effect different food composition , along age gender subject , plasma level urinary excretion isoflavones . OUTLINE : This two part study . In part I ; participant stratify accord menopausal status . In part II ; participant stratify accord gender age ( 50 vs. 50 ) . Part I - Study participant give 3 different amount toast soy nut separate one month interval . The sequence amount give randomize . Blood urine sample take measure isoflavone level . Part II - Study participant give toast soy nut , soy milk , tempeh separate occasion separate one month interval . The sequence food randomize . Blood urine sample take measure isoflavone level . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : 10 woman , 5 premenopausal 5 postmenopausal , accrue part I study . 80 subject , 40 woman 40 men , accrue part II .
